bibl.title: Plant Remains from Habitation Areas at Kellis: Some Considerations Concerning their Accumulation. Avec résumé en anglais.
Marcia F. WISEMAN (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project
bibl.author: THANHEISER, Ursula

bibl.note: Disiccated plant remains from Kellis indicate that the by-products from the early stages of crop processing were used to temper mud-bricks for domestic buildings.
THANHEISER Ursula and Christiane KÖNIG, Plant Remains from Habitation Areas at Kellis: Some Considerations Concerning their Accumulation. Avec résumé en anglais.

Marcia F. WISEMAN (Edited by) and Bruce E. PARR (Production Editor), The Oasis Papers 2. Proceedings of the Second International Conference of the Dakhleh Oasis Project = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 12 (Oxford, 2008) pp. 141-150, 2 tabl., 2 graphiques, 1 plan.
